mathale kaludawala pradeshaye heroyin mathkudu miligram 4830 k samaga pudgalayaku mathale disthrik eka watalim eekakaya magin eeye (09) athadanguwata gena thibe.sakakaru mema mathkudu thogaya pakat 67 kata asura alewikaramin sitiyadi polis parikshaka upul gunawardhana mahathata labunu thorathurak matha athadanguwata gena atha.mathale pradeshayen mathakadi soyagath wishalathama mathkudu thogaya meya bawa polisiya pawasayi.sakakaru dirgha kalayak thisse mathkudu jawarame nirathawa sita athi bawata polis parikshana magin anawaranaya wi thibe.mathale jyeshta polis adhikari thilak abesiri gunawardhana mahathage upades matha mathale disthrik eka watalim eekakaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka upul gunawardhana, polis sarayanwarun wana aththanayaka, jayawikrama, bandara polis kosthapalwarun wana bandara, yana niladharin mema watalima sidukara atha.sakakaru mathale mahesthrath adhikaranayata eeye (09) idiripath kirimen pasu rakshitha bandhanagara gathakara thibe..
ema pramanayata wada wadi deyak kamkaruwata thama shramayata nolabeyi.
eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalaye 39 wani sasiwaraya sapthambar 28 dayin nimaweyi.

wasarakata wadi kalayak gatha wannata pera porondu wana lada uthuru palath sabhawa sandaha wana kalaya samipa wana wita dan palath sabha ka්ramaya winasha kirime ho awama washayen eya sahena pamana balaya sunya kirime ki්rayawaliyak rajaya diyath kara atha.ිwyawasthawehi 13 wani sanshodhanaya ka්riyathmaka karanawa pamanak nowa arthawath balaya bedimak sandaha eyin obbatada apa yannemu’ yayi rajaya nokadawa laba demin siti porondu idiriye mema ki්rayawaliya itha pasugami wanawa pamanak nowa meya indiyawata, loka pa්rajawata pamanak nowa eksath jathinge sanwidhanayatada rajaya laba dun sahathika gananawakma ullanghanaya kirimaki.
